name: team-noobs_cvwizard
description: A website that helps users create a professional-looking resume.  CVWizard is aimed at creating a web-based application that allows users to create, edit, and customize professional-looking CVs quickly and easily.  The app will provide users with a range of customizable templates to choose from, enabling them to create a unique and eye-catching CV that best showcases their skills, experience, and achievements.
